paragraphs: =avanzar=, _v. n._, to advance, to proceed, to go forward, to come forward.
=averiguar=, _v. a._, to inquire into, to investigate, =57=, 1.
=aviado, da=, _adj._, =estar --=, =67=, 17, to be in a hole, to be in a pretty pickle (_the first meaning of the word is_ ill-situated).
=avío=, _m._, preparation, equipment, =avíos de fumar=, =66=, 24, smoking materials.
=avivar=, _v. a._, to enliven, to animate, to make piquant, =14=, 23.
=¡ay!= _interj._, alas, oh, alack, _etc._; =¡ay de...!= =100=, 23, alas for, woe to.
=bachillería=, _f._, chatter, chattering; =déjate de bachillerías=, =50=, 4, stop your nonsense.
=bajar=, _v. a._, to take down, bring down, carry down, =83=, 4; _v. n._, to go down, to get down, to descend; =--se=, _v. refl._, to come down, to descend.
=bajo, ja=, _adj._, low; small (_of stature_); =por lo --=, =39=, 9, in a low tone, =cabeza --=, =75=, 4, head bowed, head bent.
=bañarse=, _v. refl._, to bathe, to take a bath, =20=, 27.
=bastar=, _v. n._, to be enough, to be sufficient.
=bastón=, _m._, stick, staff; =-- de autoridad=, =107=, 4, staff of office.
=Baza=, _f. npr._, Baza, town about 65 miles north-east of Granada on the road to Murcia. [p. 168]
=bendito, ta=, _adj._, blessed, holy; =una bendita=, =112=, 7, a saint.
=bien=, _adv._, well; very; about; =hombre de --=, honest man, man of honor; =mujer de --=, =13=., 12, =22=, 14, honest woman, virtuous woman; =no --=, scarcely, as soon as; =o --=, or else.

=boca=, _f._, mouth; =-- del estómago=, =46=, 8, pit of the stomach; =de manos a --=, =77=, 21, suddenly, unexpectedly; =sin decir esta -- es mía=, =118=, 12, without speaking a word; =-- sumida=, =109=, 3, drawn lips; =-- hecha un agua=, =40=, 16, mouth all watering; =-- arriba=, =38=, 25, =-- abajo=, =38=, 26, face up, face down; =caer de --=, =95=, 9, to fall on the face, to fall flat.
=bola=, _f._, ball; =¡dale, --!= =98=, 25, the same old story! there he goes again!
=brisca=, _f._, brisca, a game of cards; _see note to_ =20=, 4.
=broma=, _f._, joke, jest; _see note to_ =19=, 9; =dejar la --=, to put jesting aside, =105=, 20; =no estoy para --s=, =87=, 23, I'm in no mood for joking.
=bruto, ta=, _adj._, coarse, ugly, =47=, 12; =en --=, =18=, 21, in the rough.

=bueno, na=, _adj._, good; kind; =tanto --=, =34=, 4, so much kindness, so great an honor, _see note_; =buenas noches=, good evening, good night, _cf._ =tener=, =87=, 14; =buena moza=, _cf._ =moza=; =--=, a good one, a fine one, =89=, 19; _cf._ _note_.
=bulto=, _m._, form, mass, =45=, 22; =escurrir el --=, =52=, 27, to slip away.
=burlarse (de)=, _v. refl._, to mock, to make fun of, =74=, 28.
=buscar=, _v. a._, to seek, to look for; =123=, 19, to look up, to find.
=¡ca!= _interj._, =57=, 8, =63=, 25, humph, not by a good deal, not any.
=caballería=, _f._, chivalry; riding horse, mount; _any animal commonly used for riding_.
=cabecero=, _m._, =73=, 23, lintel, head-piece (_of a door_), head (_of a bed_).
=caber=, _v. n._, to fall to one's share, to fall to, =107=, 28; to have room, to have space; =no cabe duda=, =72=, 18, there is no room for doubt, there can be no doubt.
=cabo=, _m._, end, extreme; =al --=, at last; =al -- de=, =47=, 27, at the end of, after.
=cada=, _adj._, each; =-- cual=, each one; =-- uno=, =-- una=, each one, every one.
=caer=, _v. n._, to fall; =--se=, _v. refl._, to fall, to fall down, to fall over; =se cae de su peso=, =85=, 22, it is self-evident, it goes without saying.
=calceta=, _f._, understocking (_a sort of legging, worn next the skin, and reaching to the knee_); =hacer --=, =77=, 8, to knit.
=calor=, _m._, heat, warmth; =hacer --=, to be hot (_of the weather_).
=calzar=, _v. a._, to carry (_said of the calibre of a gun_), =56=, 5.
=callado, da=, _adj._, silent, still, kept silent, suppressed.
=callar=, _v. a._, to suppress, to pass over in silence, =118=, 14; _v. n._, to be silent, to remain silent, to cease speaking.
=callejón=, _m._, alley, lane; =-- sin salida=, =50=, 23, blind alley, cul de sac.
=cambiar=, _v. a._, to exchange, to change; _v. n._, to change.
=cambio=, _m._, change, exchange; =en --=, =18=, 4, in exchange, on the other hand.
=caminar=, _v. n._, to go, to travel; to walk.
=camino=, _m._, way, road; =-- carretero=, =10=, 12, cart road, wagon road; =de --=, =51=, 14, =90=, 6, on the way; =en -- de=, =12=, 15, on the way to, in the way of.
=campanilla=, _f._, little bell; =persona de campanillas=, =11=, 19, important person, personage. [p. 171]
=campaña=, _f._, campaign; =salir a --=, =52=, 15, to take the field.
=campear=, _v. n._, to hold the field, to shine forth, to be prominent, to be in evidence, =16=, 8.
=campo=, _m._, field, open field, country, countryside; =a -- travieso=, =60=, 15, across country.
=caña=, _f._, cane, reed; =-- de Indias=, =121=, 7, bamboo cane.
=capa=, _f._, cape, cloak; =-- de grana=, scarlet cloak.
=capote=, _m._, waterproof, cloak; =-- de monte=, =94=, 12, short buttoned overcoat.
=cara=, _f._, face, countenance; =tomar la --=, =38=, 8, to chuck under the chin.
=carcajada=, _f._, laughter, violent laughter, burst of laughter.
=carecer (de)=, _v. n._, to be without, to lack; to be in need of, =15=, 7.
=cargado, da=, _adj._, full; loaded, overloaded; charged; =-- de espaldas=, stoop-shouldered, slightly hunchbacked.
=carne=, _f._, meat, flesh; _pl._ =--s=, flesh, body, weight, embonpoint, =15=, 27, =35=, 30, =82=, 2, _etc._
=carta=, _f._, letter; =-- blanca=, =90=, 1, carte blanche, unlimited authority, permission.
=casa=, _f._, house; =a --=, at home; =a --=, =8=, 14, home, to their homes.

=caso=, _m._, case, event, contingency; =hacer -- de=, =122=, 24, to pay attention to, to consider, to regard; =en su --=, =50=, 14, in your case, in your place, in your shoes; =-- de=, =56=, 21, in case of.
=Castilla=, _f. npr._, Castile; _pl._ =--s=, =25=, 30, the Castiles, Old and New Castile.
=Castillo Piñón=, _m., npr.,_ Castillo Piñón, Château Pignon; _see note to_ =15=, 15.
=causa=, _f._, cause; cause, case, =24=, 20; =conocimiento de --=, acquaintance with, familiarity with the case, the circumstances.
=cavilar=, _v. n._, to cavil; =67=, 30, to ruminate, to meditate.
=cazar=, _v. a._, to hunt, to pursue; _v. n._, to hunt.
=ceder=, _v. a._, to cede, to yield; --=el paso=, =54=, 22, =100=, 11, to make way, to give way.
=cenar=, _v. a._, to eat for supper, to sup on, =8=, 15, =54=, 3; _v. n._, to sup.
=ceñirse=, _v. refl._, to gird on, to put on, to assume.
=cerrar=, _v. a._, to shut, to close; to lock, to lock up; _v. n._ (_of night_), =45=, 12, _etc._, to close in, to fall.
=cien, ciento=, _adj., num._, hundred, one hundred, an hundred.

=cierto, ta=, _adj._, certain, sure, trustworthy; =por --=, =46=, 12, =65=, 10, _etc._, certainly, surely; =por -- que=, =33=, 4, surely; =hasta -- punto=, to a certain extent, in a measure, =15=, 29; =es --=, =38=, 1, =107=, 9, it is true, it is so.
=claro, ra=, _adj._, clear, bright; clear, evident; =es --=, =46=, 22, of course; =sacar en --=, =2=, 10, to bring out clearly, to reveal, to disclose.
=clavar=, _v. a._, to nail, to fix; to fasten; to drive in, to stick in, to thrust in, =86=, 18.
=codiciar=, _v. a._, to long for, to covet, to desire exceedingly.
=coger=, _v. a._, to gather; to seize, to overtake, to catch, =35=, 9, to pick up, to take hold of, =122=, 16; to hold, =56=, 10; to catch, pick up (_of a disease_), =88=, 18.
=cojo, ja=, _adj._, lame, limping; =parecía -- de los dos pies=, =25=, 26, seemed to limp with both feet.
=colarse=, _v. refl._, to slip in, to glide in, =78=, 6.
=colgar=, _v. a._, to hang; _pp._ =colgado, da=, hanging; _v. n._, to hang.
=comer=, _v. a._, to eat; _sp._, to eat for dinner, =8=, 7; _v. n._, to dine; to eat; =--se=, _v. refl._, to eat up, to consume; =--se la partida=, =60=, 19, to see what's up.
=comienzo=, _m._, beginning; =dar--=, to make a beginning, to begin. [p. 175]
=comisura=, _f._, junction, joint, seam; =-- de los labios=, =14=, 25, corner of the mouth.
=como=, _adv._, as, so, just as; about; as it were; =-- que=, since, inasmuch.
=como=, _conj._, if; even if; like; as if; since, because; that; =-- que=, since, although; =-- si=, as if.
=¿cómo?= _adv. int._, how, why, how is it, how does it come?
=compadecerse=, _v. refl._, to agree, to be consonant, to be compatible; to take pity on (=de=), =119=, 20.
=comparecer=, _v. n._, to appear (in court, or before authority).
=complacerse=, _v. refl._ (=de= _or_ =en=), to take pleasure in, to be pleased with.
=componer=, _v. a._, to mend, to put in order;, =37=, 20; to arrange, to fix up, =49=, 27.
=con=, _prep._, with; together with; by; through, by means of; through; from; against; =no va -- Usted=, =57=, 2, does not touch you, concern you; _see also_ =tal=; =-- tal que=, on condition that.
=concebir=, _v. a._, to conceive, to understand, to comprehend; to devise; to imagine; to suspect.
=concluir=, _v. a._, to conclude, to end; =todo parecía concluido=, all, everything seemed over, at an end.
=concurrencia=, _f._, =43=, 29, the assembly, the bystanders, those present, the persons present.
=conducir=, _v. a. and n._, to lead, to conduct.
=confesar=, _v. a._, to confess; =ir a --=, =124=, 6, to go to confession.
=congraciarse=, _v. refl._, to ingratiate oneself, to win favor.
=conocer=, _v. a._, to know; to be acquainted with; to become acquainted with; to recognize, to feel; to learn; to recognize, to distinguish.
=consagrarse=, _v. refl._, to devote oneself, consecrate oneself, =19=, 4.
=conseguir=, _v. a._, to succeed in, to accomplish; _v. n._, to succeed, to attain.
=consentir=, _v. a._, to consent to, to permit, to allow; _v. n._, to consent, to agree.
=conservar=, _v. a._, to preserve; =--se=, _v. refl._, to keep, to stay, to continue to be; =¿se conserva tan guapa?= is she as pretty as ever? =62=, 14.
=considerar=, _v. a._, to consider, to weigh, to think over;, =13=, 15; to look upon, to consider.
=consistir=, _v. n._, to consist; =-- en=, =22=, 24, to arise from, to result from, to have reason in. [p. 177]
=consistorialmente=, _adv._, consistorially (_as of a consistory, or ecclesiastical court_), =3=, 6.
=constar=, _v. n._, to be known, to be certain, to be evident.
=constitucional=, _m._, supporter of the constitution, member of the constitutional party, =25=, 8.
=contar=, _v. a._, to count, to tell, to relate; _v. n._, to count, to keep accounts, to reckon; =-- con=, to count on.
=contemplar=, _v. a._, to look at, to contemplate.
=contentarse=, _v. refl._, to content oneself, to be content, =42=, 7, =96=, 26.
=contigo=, _prep. and pron._, with you, with thee.
=contiguo, gua=, _adj._, contiguous; adjoining; near at hand, near by.
=continuar=, _v. a._, to continue, to proceed; _v. n._, to continue, to keep on.
=contrario, ria=, _adj._, contrary; =al --=, =19=, 8, on the contrary; =al --=, =85=, 14, no indeed, far from it; =de lo --=, =36=, 22, in the opposite case, otherwise; =--=, =115=, 2, opposite.
=convenir=, _v. n._, to be fitting, to be proper; to suit; to please; to agree.
=convertir=, _v. a._, to convert, change; =--se=, _v. refl._, to change, to be changed; (=---- en=) to be turned into, be converted into; to be converted. [p. 178]
=convocar=, _v. a._, to convoke, to call together.
=cónyuges=, _mpl._, married people, man and wife, couple, _tit._ VI, =122=, 26.
=copa=, _f._, glass, goblet, drinking glass, tumbler; =sombrero de --=, =127=, 10, tall hat, top hat.
=cordonazo de San Francisco=, _m._, =44=, 6, autumn equinox, autumn equinoctial storm; _see note_.
=correr=, _v. a._, to overrun; to drive, to urge; to draw (_a bolt_); _v. n._, to run; to hasten; to circulate, to be in circulation.
=correspondiente=, _adj._, corresponding; fitting, proper, suitable; appurtenant, proportionate; proper, due, destined, appointed.
=corriente=, _m._, =2=, 26, =poner uno al -- de una cosa=, to inform one of something, acquaint one with something.
=cortar=, _v. a._, to cut, to cut off.
=creer=, _v. a._, to believe; to think; =¡ya lo creo!= I should think so, rather, of course; =crea=, =48=, 6, believe, take the word of; _pres. part._, =creyendo=, =32=, 28, thinking to, planning to.
=criado=, _m._, servant, manservant; =-- de campaña=, =17=, 10, attendant in the field.
=criar=, _v. a._, to create; to nurse, to bring up.
=Cristo=, _m._, Christ; =por los clavos de --=, =105=, 18, for Christ's sake.
=cruz=, _f._, cross; =86=, 19, withers; =hacerse cruces=, =4=, 20, to cross oneself.
=cruzar=, _v. a._, to exchange, =104=, 23; =--se=, _v. refl._, to meet, to meet and pass, =114=, 14.
=cual=, _adj._, which; he who, she who; several; =lo --=, =24=, 2, which; =a --más=, =45=, 7, each more than the other.
=cualquier=, _pron. and adj._, whoever, whichever, whatever; each, every; some or other; =de -- modo=, somehow or other.
=cuanto, ta=, _adj._, so many, so much, so great; as many as, all; all that.
=cuanto=, _adv._, as much as; as long as; =en -- a=, as to, regarding; =en --=, as soon as; as, because. [p. 180]
